meanings.definition: In a deceitful or cunning manner
meanings.sent1: She guilefully tricked her friend into believing a made-up story.
meanings.sent2: He guilefully manipulated the situation to his advantage.
meanings.sent3: The cat guilefully snuck up on the unsuspecting mouse.
meanings.sent4: The magician guilefully made the coin disappear before our eyes.
meanings.sent5: The fox guilefully outsmarted the other animals in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The spy guilefully obtained the confidential information without being detected.
meanings.sent2: She guilefully avoided answering the direct question.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon guilefully stole the cookies from the jar on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The con artist guilefully convinced people to invest in a fake business.
meanings.sent5: The thief guilefully slipped through the security system and stole the valuable painting.
